page.title: 05CARE & NURSING POTT SHRIGLEY
page.content: Pott Hall in the middle of the village is now a Private Nursing & Residential home. Parts of the building date back to the 1600s .From 1830 until 1982/3 it belonged to branches of a family of cotton spinners & manufacturers based in Bollington."Homes" have to be registered with County Councils & the local Health Authority to maintain country-wide standards. The Home has 13 bedrooms accomodating 22 residents, six can be full nursing cases , the local medical practice & qualified staff look after patients.19 part-time staff cook, serve & care for the mostly elderley residents.Long,& short stays & post operative care are provided,all pay fees. 4 Dayrooms and gardens allow comfort space fresh-air and exercise, while visitors, pets and cheerful decorations foster an atmosphere of a caring community.
